recipe.title: Mixed Berry French Toast Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; mixed berries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries ; (200 g)

steps.step: Whisk eggs, cinnamon, vanilla and milk together in medium-large bowl to create egg wash.
Melt butter in a skillet on medium-low heat and cook bread for 2-3 minutes.
Mix berries, sugar, and lemon juice in medium pan over low heat crushing and stirring berries until they form a thick sauce.
Lay out slices and spread compote in between each slice then on top. Garnish with confectioners sugar (optional).

steps_updated.steps_updated: Whisk eggs, cinnamon, vanilla and milk together in medium-large bowl to create egg wash.
Melt butter in a skillet on medium-low heat and cook bread for 2-3 minutes.
Mix berries, sugar, and lemon juice in medium pan over low heat crushing and stirring berries until they form a thick sauce.
Lay out slices and spread compote in between each slice then on top.
